info.name: ForgeRock Utilities
info.description:
These variables should be set in your environment:

- FORGEROCK_API_KEY
- FORGEROCK_API_SECRET
- TENNENT_ENV
- FORGEROCK_SERVICE_ID
    

These variables may need to be set depending on the request:

- userName
- userId
    

Make sure to have the local server running that generates your access tokens.
